Detailed Description

MIR specific tree node to represent a string literal. Because it's not possible to pass around string literals once we reach the lower levels of the compiler we instead work with their address and stick them in the .data section. We can't hardcode a particular literal to a string var as it's possible to re-assign values to them so working with references to a single set of literals makes life a lot simpler.
